statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_quality_performance;
SELECT supplier_name, quality_rating FROM supplier_quality_performance WHERE quality_rating > 4;
SELECT supplier_name, performance_notes FROM supplier_quality_performance ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_quality_performance WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, quality_rating FROM supplier_quality_performance WHERE quality_rating < 3 ORDER BY quality_rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_quality_performance WHERE quality_rating > 3 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM supplier_quality_performance WHERE quality_rating < 2 ORDER BY quality_rating ASC, supplier_name ASC;

SELECT supplier_name, quality_rating FROM supplier_quality_performance WHERE supplier_name IN ('Supplier A', 'Supplier B', 'Supplier C') AND quality_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY quality_rating DESC, supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_quality_performance WHERE performance_notes LIKE '%issues%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, quality_rating DESC;

SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, AVG(quality_rating) AS avg_quality_rating FROM supplier_quality_performance GROUP BY supplier_id, supplier_name HAVING avg_quality_rating > 3 ORDER BY avg_quality_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_rating FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_rating > 4;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_rating FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_rating < 3 ORDER BY supplier_rating DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(report_id) AS report_count FROM suppliers LEFT JOIN quality_reports ON suppliers.supplier_id = quality_reports.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_rating > 4 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_rating FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_rating < 3.5 ORDER BY supplier_rating DESC
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_suppliers FROM suppliers

SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, quality_reports.report_date FROM suppliers INNER JOIN quality_reports ON suppliers.supplier_id = quality_reports.supplier_id WHERE quality_reports.report_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM supplier_info;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM supplier_info ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_reports WHERE violation_description LIKE '%serious%';
SELECT supplier_name, quality_rating FROM supplier_info WHERE quality_rating > 4 ORDER BY quality_rating DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, report_date FROM supplier_info JOIN quality_reports ON supplier_info.supplier_id = quality_reports.supplier_id ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_info;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM supplier_info WHERE quality_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM quality_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT q.supplier_id, q.report_date, i.inspector_name FROM quality_reports q INNER JOIN inspection_logs i ON q.report_id = i.report_id;

SELECT s.supplier_name, q.report_date, l.inspection_result FROM supplier_info s INNER JOIN quality_reports q ON s.supplier_id = q.supplier_id INNER JOIN inspection_logs l ON q.report_id = l.report_id WHERE s.quality_rating > 3 ORDER BY q.report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT * FROM quality_performance ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, performance_rating, performance_date FROM suppliers INNER JOIN quality_performance ON suppliers.supplier_id = quality_performance.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers INNER JOIN quality_performance ON suppliers.supplier_id = quality_performance.supplier_id
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, performance_rating FROM suppliers JOIN quality_performance ON suppliers.supplier_id = quality_performance.supplier_id WHERE performance_rating >= 80

SELECT supplier_name, issue_description, audit_date FROM suppliers INNER JOIN quality_performance ON suppliers.supplier_id = quality_performance.supplier_id INNER JOIN issues ON quality_performance.performance_id = issues.performance_id INNER JOIN audits ON issues.issue_id = audits.issue_id WHERE audit_result = 'Passed'

SELECT supplier_name, performance_rating, issue_description, audit_result FROM suppliers JOIN quality_performance ON suppliers.supplier_id = quality_performance.supplier_id JOIN issues ON quality_performance.performance_id = issues.performance_id JOIN audits ON issues.issue_id = audits.issue_id WHERE performance_rating < 50 AND audit_result = 'Failed'

SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(issue_id) AS total_issues FROM suppliers LEFT JOIN quality_performance ON suppliers.supplier_id = quality_performance.supplier_id LEFT JOIN issues ON quality_performance.performance_id = issues.performance_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_issues > 0
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, quality_rating FROM supplier_quality_performance;
SELECT * FROM product_quality_metrics WHERE defect_count > 5;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM supplier_quality_performance ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, defect_type, inspection_date FROM product_quality_metrics WHERE defect_count < 3 ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inspection_history WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT supplier_name, quality_rating FROM supplier_quality_performance ORDER BY quality_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM supplier_quality_performance WHERE quality_rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, defect_count, defect_type FROM product_quality_metrics ORDER BY defect_count ASC, defect_type DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email_address, phone_number, department FROM supplier_contacts WHERE department = 'Logistics';
SELECT standard_name, description, category FROM quality_standards WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
